item.title: How to make commands work in the Wilderness? [508] PALI BASE
item.dc:creator: @Zacmaster22 Zacmaster22
item.description:
@Zacmaster22 wrote:

Well this is the command, and also guys its the last command in the commands.java

		}
		if (cmd[0].equals("coords")) {
                		p.frames.sendMessage(p, "x: " + p.absX + ", y: " + p.absY + ", height : " + p.heightLevel);
            	}
	}
  } else {
	p.frames.sendMessage(p, "You cannot use commands in the Wilderness!");
	return;
  }
    } catch (Exception error) {
        error.printStackTrace();
    }
}

}
whenever i remove the catch exeption error and pframes sendmessage i always get an error saying try without catch or finally? -.- btw if it helps this is palidinos base. [br][br][size=1]Posted on: May 28, 2009, 04:24:11 am[/size][hr]Any Ideas Guys ;(
